description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to increase access to senior secondary education in underserved districts and improve quality in low-performing senior high schools in Ghana.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Independent Verification | Description :The Recipient shall, by no later than three (3) months after theEffective Date, appoint external monitoring and evaluation experts (“Independent Verifiers”), to act as third-party verifiers ofthe proper fulfillment of the DLIs and DLRs set forth in Schedule 4 in the Financing Agreement | Due Date :01-Jan-2015

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, C.1.(a) | Description: The Recipient shall, by no later than three (3) months after theEffective Date, appoint external monitoring and evaluation experts ("€œIndependent Verifiers"€?), to act as third-party verifiersof the proper fulfillment of the DLIs and DLRs set forth in Schedule 4 to the Financing Agreement | Due Date :04-Feb-2018

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, C.2.(a) | Description :The Recipient shall cause the Independent Verifiers to furnish tothe Association every calendar semester, starting six months after the Effective Date, regular reports (â€œEEP SpendingReportsâ€?)prepared in accordance with the provisions of the Project Implementation Manual. | Frequency :SemiAnnual
